Html: The latest source code of Webservice Studio has trouble handling Nullable Type.  I created a simple webservice (WCF) with a nullable int in the request.  After the tree is rendered in the form, the value field of the nullable variable doesn't take in any value.  When try to change the IsNull to false, an error pops up with the following text "Not able to create an Instance of System.Nullable `1[[System.Int32, mscorlib, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, Public....]]".  Has anyone looked into this bug?
我这里是int的还行，decimal的不行，这是为啥呢？
I've just opened alternate project on http://code.google.com/p/webservicestudio2/ and added solution of this problem. It's quite lame but it works for me.
